javax.sound.sampled

Class AudioFileFormat.Type

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.sound.sampled.AudioFileFormat.Type
  • Enclosing class:
    AudioFileFormat

    public static class AudioFileFormat.Type
extends Object
    An instance of the Type class represents one of the standard types of audio file. Static instances are provided for the common types.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static AudioFileFormat.Type AIFC
      Specifies an AIFF-C file.
      static AudioFileFormat.Type AIFF
      Specifies an AIFF file.
      static AudioFileFormat.Type AU
      Specifies an AU file.
      static AudioFileFormat.Type SND
      Specifies a SND file.
      static AudioFileFormat.Type WAVE
      Specifies a WAVE file.

    • Constructor Summary
